name: Roller Dodger
description:
Sorry for the long 8 seconds intro lol self-promotion go brrrrr. . .

Honorable mentions: Evan King aka Context-Sensitive for sick music that we stole from him check out his channel there are re-direct links to his channel in the credits too he makes sick music I personally have 20XX music album, muck soundtrack, crab game soundtrack, jelly drift soundtrack and probably more on my spotify music list that I listened while working on the game

IMPORTANT IN UNITY THE GAME WORKED BETTER LOL WE HAVE NO CLUE HOW TO FIX IT SORRY

Roller Dodger is Endless runner where you dodge obstalces that are in your way good thing is that this roller coaster has 3 lanes to dodge please report bugs in the comment section
(ITS OUR FIRST HTML BROWSER GAME THAT WE EVER MADE)

We offer:
- Cool looking loading screen
- Fun Gameplay
- Laggy parallax (i hate parallax never again we spend like 2 days out of 7 on it and its laggy)
- Pause menu ( we mention it bc rarely at game jams we see games with pause menu)

Controls:
W, ArrowUp, joystick up - Up
S, ArrowDown, joystick down - Down
esc - Pause

Note:
The controls for the pad aren't full we didn't had time in the main gameplay it works but you can't press buttons or pause.
We spend to much time making parallax (it was hard and still laggy) and we couldn't make it speed up with game but the games is getting harer with time.
We joined the jam when it started we sometimes were getting distracted and ended up playing minecraft for 4 hours but it was fun.
